sources.title: The Big Cat
sources.description: During the Great Depression, a young man leaves his Eastern home for his late mother's birthplace in the Utah hills. He finds that things are far from peaceful on the frontier, thanks to a feud between rival ranchers and a deadly mountain lion on the prowl.

sources.title: The Big Cat (1949) ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Lon McCallister, Peggy Ann Garner, Preston Foster
 Director: Phil Karlson

 A city boy arrives in his late mother's birthplace to discover the locals have been pestered by drought, old fights and a cougar. He turns out to be pivotal in all of these.

sources.title: The Big Cat - 1949 Adventure - Cougar’s Reign of Terror—Only a True Hunter Can Stop It!
sources.description:
In the drought-stricken Utah hills of the 1930s, city slicker Danny Turner (Lon McCallister) arrives at his late mother’s birthplace, where locals are locked in fear of a cunning cougar and simmering grudges. Teaming up with stepfather Tom Eggers (Preston Foster) and love interest Doris Cooper (Peggy Ann Garner), Danny faces off against both the ferocious beast and hostile neighbor Gil Hawks (Forrest Tucker), proving that courage runs deeper than city roots 

Director: Phil Karlson
Writers: Morton Grant, Dorothy Yost

Main actors:
Lon McCallister - Danny Turner
Peggy Ann Garner - Doris Cooper
Preston Foster - Tom Eggers
Forrest Tucker - Gil Hawks
Skip Homeier - Jim Hawks
Sara Haden - Mrs. Mary Cooper
Irving Bacon - Matt Cooper
Gene Reynolds - Wid Hawks

Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Romance, Western
Release date: April 1949 (USA)


00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
01:18 Foreword
02:36 Danny Turner arrives in his late mother's Utah hometown, seeking a new beginning.
10:15 Tom Eggers confronts Gil Hawks over land disputes, reigniting old feuds.
20:45 Danny meets Doris Cooper, sparking a budding romance amidst the turmoil.
35:30 The community organizes a hunt after a cougar attacks local livestock.
50:00 Tragedy strikes when the cougar kills Tom, leaving Danny devastated.
1:00:20 Determined to avenge Tom, Danny ventures into the wilderness alone.
1:10:05 Danny confronts the cougar in a fierce battle, emerging victorious.
1:15:00 With the cougar defeated, Danny and Doris look forward to a hopeful future together.
